channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The price of the measles: It costs at least $16,200 every time someone gets them.
item.description: As measles outbreaks increase and more people contract the disease, the U.S. healthcare system faces a costly bill.

item.title: Google has been crushing it with AI this year in this overlooked way
item.description: Waymo, the Alphabet-backed robotaxi startup, has been on a tear. Soon it could be worth $100 billion.

item.title: Netflix appears to be in the driver’s seat on Warner Bros. bid as board rejects Paramount offer
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery urged shareholders to stay with Netflix’s offer, saying Paramount’s bid undervalues the company, has shaky financing and has no...

item.title: Is a new OpenAI deal what Amazon’s stock needs to finally come alive?
item.description: Amazon’s stock is near flat this year. A reported $10 billion deal with OpenAI may energize investors — or it could fuel further fears about an AI bub...

item.title: ‘He never asks for anything’: I’m 61 with a $1.5 million 401(k). My girlfriend says I do too much for my son, 28. Is she right?
item.description: “I recently gave him $20,000 for a newer car and had him finance the rest.”

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
